articles.author: STEVE PEOPLES
articles.title: Koch network formally backs Nikki Haley for GOP primary - The Associated Press
articles.description: The political arm of the powerful Koch network has endorsed Nikki Haley’s presidential campaign. Americans for Prosperity promises to commit its nationwide army of activists and virtually unlimited funds to help Haley defeat former President Donald Trump in t…
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) Americans for Prosperity, the political arm of the powerful Koch network, formally endorsed Nikki Haleys presidential campaign on Tuesday, promising to commit its nationwide coalition o… [+5991 chars]
